messages.subject: This email list...was not responsible for others feelings
messages.msgSnippet: i have noticed a negative and judging feeling thing out there on this list and wonder if i am the only one feeling this Dina, Our guidelines very clearly
messages.messageBody:
"i have noticed a negative and judging feeling thing
out there on this list and wonder if i am the only one
feeling this"

Dina,
Our guidelines very clearly state that discussing the posts is off
limits. If you have a problem with something, either ignore the
advice, or give advice YOU feel is most helpful please.

If you're here to say negative things about the list, or about how
people are posting, that is going against the lists guidelines.

For the record, I have recieved some very positive emails from folks
thanking Kelly and I for starting the list, so apparently it's
working for most of the people here. We aren't going to please
everyone, but please refrain from talking about other posts.
Just post what you think is helpful, it will keep the list flowing
much smoother. Thank you.

Ren
